brand_identity.name: Boltrex
brand_identity.mission: To provide a robust, high-speed inventory and sales management system for modern businesses.
brand_identity.archetype: The Dark Knight of POS Systems

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and modal titles. Tracking-tight is mandatory for sizes > 24px.

body.usage: Use for all standard UI text, labels, and descriptions.

mono.usage: MANDATORY for all prices, inventory counts, SKUs, and tabular data.

rules: Use 1px borders (border-white/10) to define structure instead of heavy shadows.
Active states should use a subtle glow or high-contrast white border.

grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Dense data, no wasted space.
grid_system.marketing_login: Tetris Grid: grid-cols-12 gap-8. Asymmetrical and artistic.

container_rules: Dashboard cards must have p-6 padding.
Tables must be dense but legible.
Sidebar must be fixed width (240px) and collapsible.

inputs.style: bg-input border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10

tables.style: Simple, no vertical borders. Header text-muted-foreground uppercase text-xs tracking-wider.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/40 for sticky headers and sidebars.
visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture to the main background to prevent banding in dark mode.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active cards or high-priority alerts.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for Login/Register pages with overlay bg-black/60.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for a refined, technical look.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1).
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not use generic 'blue' for primary actions; use the defined monochrome palette.
Ensure all charts have tooltips and legends.
Use 'Shadcn' components for all interactive elements (dropdowns, dialogs, etc.).
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow these guidelines strictly. Use the provided image URLs. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Ensure the 'Dark Mode' is consistent and high-contrast. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data.
